There is a free platform for everyone and always will be just select the problem and we will do or best to sort it out Need help for others Need Help for yourself Enter Information Get Current Location Or give address below Please add any government id proof like aadhar card,pan card,voter id,driving liscence,rashan card. Use camera Select Type Of Help : The best way to persue happiness is to help others! Need Help Donate Money Donate by watching ads Select the Money Range Stationary Money Books Money Food Money Money Directly Enter Amount Phone Number Next username A step towards Humanity... Submitted Sucessfully Thankyou for putting your request on our app. Select problem Education Food Medical faciltites Need Blood clothing Need Money Housing Dalit Upliftment Biotechnology Differently abled Person Old people Human Rights Information Technology Agriculture Child Development Consumer Rights Awareness of Insurance Enterpreneurship Community cooperative and Resource Building human Welfare \"Water and Sanitation \" E-governance E-learning Community Development Environment and Forests Vocational Training Disaster Management Health And Family Welfare Land Resource Labour and Employment HIV/Aids Food Processing Drinking Water Youth Affairs Art & culture Water resource Tourism Urban Development & Poverty Alleviation Sports Scientific and Industrial Research Science and Technology Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation Right to Information and Advocacy Prisioner\'s issues Panchayati Raj Nutrition New and Renewable Energy Minority issues Micro Small and Minor Enterprises Micro Finance (SHGs) Land Resource Legal Awareness and AID Tribal affairs Animals Husbandry,Dairying,Fisheries Social Development Civic issues Marriage of deprived girls Sustainable Development State budget analysis in perspective of poor We can\'t help everyone but... everyone can help someone \'If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent,Those funds are well spent.\'
